Title: The Icing
Writer: David Meyers (story), David Meyers, David Meyers
Actors: Tony Marino, Kelly LaMont, Jeff Harrigan, Anthony Bonaventura
Plot: An ex-cop whose only goal is to assassinate a state senator and collect $100,000 dollars. Marilyn Bellows, the senator's wife, orders the hit. Marilyn will go to any extreme - lust, ...
